on reading compounds: 青果【セイカ】fruit(s) and vegetables, produce
青雲【セイウン】blue sky, erudition, detachment from the world, high rank
入れ墨【イレズミ】tattoo (esp. a traditional Japanese one), tattooing
回青【カイセイ】Mohammedan blue (pigment used in porcelain painting)
青面金剛【ショウメンコンゴウ】Blue-Faced Vajra
青龍【セイリョウ】blue dragon (an auspicious creature in Chinese mythology), Azure Dragon (god said to rule over the eastern heavens)
緑青【ロクショウ】verdigris, green rust, copper rust
花緑青【ハナロクショウ】Paris green, emerald green
kun reading compounds: 青【あお】blue, azure, green, green light (traffic), black (horse coat color), blue poetry ribbon card (in hanafuda), immature, unripe, young
プロシア青【プロシアあお】Prussian blue
深青【ふかあお】dark blue, deep blue, navy blue
青い【あおい】blue, azure, green, pale, gray, grey, unripe, inexperienced
